SITE_NAME.description: The name of your deployment, e.g., Open Synthesis. If you are planning on running a public instance, please do not use the name 'Open Synthesis' because may it cause confusion between your deployment and the official website.

SITE_DOMAIN.description: The domain (including subdomain) that the deployment is being hosted at. This is should be set to app-name.herokuapp.com where app-name is the name of the Heroku app. If you plan on using a custom domain, it should be set to the custom domain, e.g., www.customdomain.com.

ADMIN_PASSWORD.description: Website admin's password. NOTE: this value will be shown on the application's settings page. Delete this configuration variable once you've deployed the application.

ADMIN_EMAIL_ADDRESS.description: Website admin's email address. Used as default email address for sending/receiving email

DJANGO_SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies

DEBUG.description: Whether or not the application is running in DEBUG mode (DO NOT ENABLE IN PRODUCTION)

ROLLBAR_ENABLED.description: Whether or not warnings and errors should be sent to Rollbar for analysis (default=True)

ACCOUNT_EMAIL_REQUIRED.description: Whether users must provide a valid email before using the service (default=True)

ACCOUNT_REQUIRED.description: Whether a user must have an account to access the site (default=False)

INVITE_REQUIRED.description: Whether a user must receive an invitation to join the site (default=False)

DEFAULT_FROM_EMAIL.description: Default email address for sending emails to users (default=ADMIN_EMAIL_ADDRESS)

EVIDENCE_REQUIRE_SOURCE.description: Whether or not analysts must provide a corroborating source when adding a piece of evidence (default=True)

scripts.postdeploy: python manage.py migrate && python manage.py setname && python manage.py createadmin && python manage.py loaddata source_tags && python manage.py check --deploy
